message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.SY

The paper deals with the problem of allocating multiple users to wireless channels in a decentralized manner, which involves learning the inherent channel quality and the best allocations of users to channels. This problem is related to several areas of computer science, including machine learning (cs.LG), information theory (cs.IT), networking and internet architecture (cs.NI), game theory (cs.GT), and systems and control (cs.SY). However, given the focus on online learning algorithms and the analysis of convergence and performance, we believe that cs.LG is the most likely category, followed by cs.IT and cs.NI. The other categories are also relevant but less directly related to the main contributions of the paper.
